original_text: And they shall take of the blood, and strike it on the two side posts and on the upper door post of the houses, wherein they shall eat it.
korean_text: 그 피를 양을 먹을 집 좌우 문설주와 인방에 바르고

sentences.original_text: And they shall take of the blood
and strike it on the two side posts
and on the upper door post of the houses

sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에서 그것을 먹게 될 것이다
